column3: If you want service before, during and after your stay, the Movenpick Casablanca is the hotel you want.
column4: In late November I flew into Casablanca to begin a 24-day tour of the country. But I needed to leave some baggage in Casablanca; I needed a few other things too. I was looking at the cheaper hotels, but then decided that a full-service hotel was the way to go. Smartest decision I made this trip! The way I knew that this was a full-service hotel is that, before selecting a hotel, I emailed the Movenpick Casablanca with a few questions; they replied with thoughtful answers. I asked about getting my big box from the airport; got a quick reply. I asked if there were ATMs at the airport, as I had heard; another quick reply. A week AFTER I left the hotel I received an email from them, asking how was my trip was going, and inviting me to reach out to the Movenpick Casablanca if any…

Nice hotel. Comfortable beds. Spacious. Wonderful front desk and concierge staff. We had 2 rooms next to each other which had a common door to the lobby. Very pretty rooftop with a nice bar, restaurant and swimming pool. Good drinks and tapas. Excellent elaborate breakfast. Close to many good restaurants. We had dinner at Le Cabestan which is a 14 minute drive from this hotel. (Le Cabestan is a must visit restaurant. Gorgeous and amazing food!)

Great hotel with a beautifull ambiance and lovely hospitality approachable staffs, great and best reception team especially Miss Abir she's very kind and helpful,nice spa and excellent food. I really enjoyed and i will strongly recommend this hotel thanks to Movenpick hotel's team .

There are two things I am not going to regret about, thé first one is coming To morocco second one i.e. choosing moveinpick hotel as home town of my stayment . Literally speaking ,I had a harmful welcome from the reception the ladies there were so Nice ,I do remember the girl rania for being gentle, smiley. Everything was right good, I Weill ne there soin again..

Excellent hotel in Casablanca. Room was huge and spacious. Clean with good amenities. Roof top bar has beautiful views. Walking distance from a few restaurants. Breakfast had a decent variety. Easy access to tram and taxis.

We visited the Movenpick hotel in Casablanca for a buffet lunch during a ship’s shore excursion. We must admit to being excited when we found out where lunch was being hosted as we know Movenpick is a top end hotel. We were not disappointed. The hotel foyer is beautiful and we sneaked a peak into their stunning breakfast room. We headed upstairs to one of the function rooms for a luscious Moroccan feast including a beef tagine which included pineapple - wow! A first with us but we are firm fans of all the tagines that come with fruit or nuts. The staff were super friendly including an older Moroccan man who was on the buffet staff and ensured that we had top ups of wine and coffee and was simply charming. Due to our experience at our private function lunch, we would not…

Fantastic business stay at Movenpick hotel. Its location in the heart of the city is greatly appreciated. Warm welcoming personnel and very solicitous to the well being and satisfaction of their guests. Superb view from the roof top bar restaurant « le 16eme » and wonderful team. Special thanks to Hassen 🤗

Good relaxing break, friendly welcoming staff specially sherine very good location for city center and location transport over all an enjoyable stay the hotel is very very comfortable for the guests and the family and the ROOF is very special .

I want to share my review to let you know the outstanding customer service that your staff sherin tareq provided. She was always been very attentive and helpful. Her kind gesture and hospitality has always been beyond satisfactionanding,... Thank you !

column3: Great hotel in a beautiful city
column4: Our stay at your hotel was absolutely fantastic the staff were great specially gentlemen call Hanzazi Youssef who offer us a great help and made our stay very pleasant well done for the good work to keep all your customers vey happy well done once again

We had a pleasant stay at the hotel and staff were helpful, specially a member of staff whom we met in the lift I believe his name was Youssef Hanzazi. He offered to help though he was just passing. Thank you again

Definitely enjoyed each and every moment. I had things to quickly resolve on my own and despite being busy, they were incredibly nice. I enjoyed the stay and I am looking forward to coming back again. Kudos to Rania and her front desk team.

After over a week touring Morocco and staying primarily in Riads, we were looking for a modern, international hotel in Casablanca that would not blow our budget. The Movenpick was perfect. We were able to book a suite here for the price of a regular room at competing properties. Service was very good. The menu at the rooftop bar/restaurant was limited, but the food was good. I would stay here again.

Great location. The staff were super polite one of them named Rania, she's very adorable, and friendly, most importantly she made sure I'm not missing anything in room. The room was nice and clean, and soundproof. The breakfast was delicious! Very recommended.

It was great vacation hotel staff are very professional and nice i recommend it for every one , i liked also the sky bar the food music was great the view also was nice in the center of casablanca jkj

Excellent location, hotel decor is beautiful, rooms are really spacious, they are spotless, it was outstanding - clean, amazing bathroom, Super King bed! Everything about this room was totally amazing! The value for money was the main reason for our choice, The restaurant is great, there are good servants who work perfectly with respect, especially a beautiful girl called Aisha, she is very kind and has everything time with a smile on his face, allowing customers to come his way ,I couldn't say enough good things about this place. Great, great, great

I really had a great time at Movenpick Hotel Casablanca,Mr Hassan the Head waiter was really helpful and very attentive and caring knowing that I had no knowledge about the Morocco dishes, World class service from Hassan.

Best hotel ever in Casablanca center, staff friendly and helpful, i have passed in experience honestly waw with my team hopping come back and see you again special thanks to the IT Noureddine. Hopping see you soon 🥳

We came last week in the evening in your hotel .it was a lady whose name rania .she was so fluffy and her hospitality was reaally adorable .she knew that it was our honeymoon occasion. She offered un upgrade and a voucher for us.besides.the service was good .the food the rooftop too .sincerly .we would like to come again

column3: Clean but super run down rooms
column4: The room was dark and the mattress was like a brick. The water from the shower goes all over the bathroom. Everything was clean and the staff were incredibly nice. But I would definitely look at staying somewhere else if I were you………………………….

column3: Personal stat review foe movenpick Casablanca
column4: Very good experience , when traveling for business in Casablanca and having such environment to rest and prepare for your business appointments specially with such an excellent assistance from the IT manager of the hotel Mr Noureddine ait fellah who helped me a lot also thanks to all the stuff there.

Nice hôtel nice staff Big thanks for the IT team best internet Line and wifi ever in Casablanca i highly recommended movenpick hôtel Casablanca in the centre city with a great view in the roof top high quality

column3: Great staff, great hotel, and the best of the best service . Highly recommended.
column4: Jalila was amazing!! Highly recommend this hotel and the staff. Very nice and informative. Had a great time here. The rooms and service was great and everyone was helpful. Bar and pool were clean and great drinks. If you’re in Casablanca you should come to this hotel

We have booked for a classical room and get surprised by an upgrade on the front desk which was really cheerful for us .it was a cute lady there her name is Rana and her manager The service was awesome .the food everything was good and we are planing to comeback to celebrate the new year there too.also my family gonna come .I advise you to go there nowadays cuz you gonna enjoy the stay .

column3: Hotel lives up to its reputation
column4: This hotel is a marvel, I am very happy to have had the chance to stay there. Everything is perfect, the welcome, the service, the friendliness of the staff, the splendor of the place... An idyllic setting, improbably beautiful and refined, the buffet by the pool is stunning in terms of quality and variety. Impossible to go to Casablanca without going through the Movenpik hotel It is in the city center all the places are surrounded by you, It is a great quality. The place has an indescribable charm, All the staff are friendly and helpful Plus we met a charming girl called Aicha at the 16th floor restaurant She is too gallant And most importantly she works with a professional spirit. You have to live it to understand it. I recommend this palace where the staff will welcome…

column3: I highly recommend visiting the movenpick hotel for foreigners, it is a very clean and wonderful hotel
column4: I would like to share my wonderful experience and stay at the hotel , my friend and I came all the way from Canada and stayed at the hotel , it was beautiful hotel with a great view and spacious rooms that are very clean and a very caring staff. our guide suggested us to try the Spa and it was wonderful, we were blessed to be taken care of by two amazing and caring girls Aicha and Hasna that i want to thank a lot for their kindness and professionalism , the Hamame and Spa were very good thanks to this wonderful girls. A great professional team in all departments thanks to a good conductor, one of the best managing directors ever met, always present. our stay in the hotel was very enjoyable and i recommende everyone to try it.

column3: Most Helpful Concierge at the Casablanca Movenpick
column4: During our stay in Casablanca my wife contracted Covid. We had to extend our stay at the Movenpick Hotel, cancel and rebook a new flight and arrange airport transportation. The Chief Concierge Hassan Zouhdy was most helpful in aiding us to make these arrangements. We were most grateful for his expertise which served to relieve some of the anxiety associated with these changes.

The serving staff at the pool bar (Arnele or Arnold) was awesome. He provided top notch service . Also, the head concierge Hassan was very helpful, he assisted us with local restaurants and taxi information.

Amazing and relaxing stay at Casablanca is guaranteed at Mövenpick. If you tired after hot day just jump in the rooftop pool on 16th floor. As well bar, pool service and lovely restaurant “16ème Floor” to your service. Thank you for special care of Hassan and of course super service minded, always smiling and always for you service Armel!! You are a rising star! Thank you! You made my stay! I had a amazing and lovely stay! I strongly recommend Mövenpick for your stay. As negative things during the stay, as I am Accor Diamond member I am extremely disappointed that hotel tried to sell me late check out, explaining it is General Manager (GM) design. (Room was available that why it was for sale otherwise hotel can not sale late check out if next guest check in soon). I…

column3: Hotel is more 2 star than rated 5 star
column4: Hotel staff were inexperienced and did not seem to know how to do their jobs. Front desk did not pay attention to details, sky bar broke a bottle next to us and left glass all over without bothering to clean it up and spa was the worst experience I ever had in the world. I question the validity of the masseuse.

I am staying with a travel group at this hotel in Casablanca. I had a problem because the lens in my eyeglasses came out. I went to the concierge, Hassan, to see if they might help me with my problem. He immediately told me of a close by optician then he actually walked me there and my glasses were quickly fixed. The service provided by Hassan was wonderful. This hotel really cares about their guests!

column3: No choice, it's the only decent hotel in Casablanca!
column4: The property is one of the most beautiful places I ever had the pleasure to stay at. Very well decorated, beautiful garden and just the most calming atmosphere ever. Everything was just fantastic! First time here and hope to come back more times. The hotel is beautiful, the rooms very well decorated, the pool is amazing and the food at the restaurant also. The bar was fantastic with a great menu selection plus fantastic service. This bring me to the next topic... the restaurant. We loved the food. There was nothing we ate that we did not like. Everything was tasty and cooked with fresh produce, the service overall was fantastic, everyone was very attentive and thinking ahead which made our stay effortless. A beautiful girl there named Aisha greeted me very warmly. She's so cute…

column3: Uk review. O-K hotel. Not the best. Poor service from reception, concierge, worst spa - avoid. Go elsewhere, good breaky
column4: Pros: Reception is spacious, breakfast was nice and staff were attentive. Housekeeping were responsive. The roof top restaurant greatttt service. Especially, Essafa @ Le seizieme, what a gentleman! Very attentive, went above and beyond. English was excellent, he is so hard working and made our visit feel like we were family ! Well done Essafa, I’d recommend the restaurant due to to you! The food was good. Concierge staff member young man, beige suite, fair skinned, glasses, gold glasses I think?maybe black… didn’t catch his name,.. he helped us check in… the lady on reception gave us a room on 7th floor he took us and the the room door was open, getting renovated, no lights worked… luckily he came with our luggage and said no… let’s go back downstairs and had to tell her to…

column3: Very friendly hotel in a busy part of the city
column4: Overall we were quite happy with our stay. In particular the concierge, Mr Hassan, was super helpful as our bags were lost by the airline. He continuously kept us up to date and called the airport twice a day to check on the progress of our bags. The location, however, wasn't ideal for a family trip. The crossroad on which the hotel is located is very congested with traffic and there is limited loading / unloading zones. The tram line is also right in front of the hotel, so it could be a good location for the business traveller. The rooftop bar was very cool, but the servers were not always available to take orders and help the clientele. The beds are nice and comfortable and the decor is quite up to date.

column3: Central and comfortable hotel in central Casablanca
column4: We booked this hotel (four women) as we wanted access to a pool and a hamman. We all enjoyed our treatments - I had a terrific therapist called Imane for my massage. We also enjoyed chilling out by the pool after a hectic 10 day guided tour of the country.

Located in the business center of the city, this could have been perfect. However, the streets on either side of it were quite busy & noisy. The rooms were sound-proof so that helped. It didn't make moving around the vicinity very good because it was a high-traffic area. Our tour bus could not even stop for very long. Porters & Front Desk staff were efficient. The modern decor and the color theme of grey and black would have been something I really like but because the hotel and the rooms were small, the color made it seem even smaller. The black-grey color theme for the rooms just made them visually and actually cramped. So, this didn't work for me. I liked their amenities and toiletries, but the water when showering spilled to the floor. The room was well-cleaned. I…

OMG we had the best experience and quality time . Thanks to Mr Kalini and the super beautiful managers Mrs Jalila and Mrs Fatima who always give you the best service, and on the toproof we have Mr Hassan and staff who are so service wise and hospitality at a high standard . Thanks everyone from Mövenpick we will be back soon

I would like to thank all the team members working in this hotel and especially Miss LATIFA , I would like to thank this employee for her welcoming time, for her sympathy, amazing smile, professionalism and kindness. She was present with us at anytime and she was serving us and responding to our requires. Thanks a million for Latifa and all team members in this hotel, I will be back certainly ❤️❤️❤️❤️ Mr OMAR

Front Desk: The front desk staff did not greet me upon my arrival at the hotel’s front desk. I give 1 star to the front desk. Restaurant - Pool Bar: Essafa, the restaurants’s head waiter, took care of my colleagues and me during our stay. I give 5 stars to the restaurant and Essafa!!!

Incredible hotel with an amazing staff. The food on the rooftop is incredible and authentic, the servers are very attentive and kind. I received plenty of recommendations for activities around the city, I would recommend staying here or checking out the restaurant! Gorgeous!

Thank you for your hospitality. I could definitely say that it was the best vacation I've ever spent with my husband, he agrees. I am so sad though, it only lasted a week. Will make sure to make it a longer stay next time we visit. A huge thanks to Rania who helped us a lot during our stay there since she was the only one speaking English, she even recommended us places to visit in Casablance, how nice of her! Best wishes xx

Amazing place to stay at, wish I could've stayed longer, will definitely be back! The manager was very professional,the staff were nice, the receptionists Rania, Fatimzahra,Zakaria,Majid were super helpful, always available. The rooms were soundproof, and very neat,the rooms were soundproof, and very neat. The pool was clean, I enjoyed my everyday breakfast next to it. Definitely recommend!

Last month was my first time coming to Casablanca.nd my first station was ur hotel ofc and I was very confortable due to ur service. The first contact with the beautiful team on the reception rania, fatima and the gentleman, without denying the breakfast which was really good and pool. Sincerely u r the best.

I spent almost 10 days at Movenpick Casablanca Hotel and I have had a very good time at the hotel. All the members of the team were very professional and helpful whenever I needed some help. I must absolutely mention the Hostess Ms.Imane at the Spa department because she was a so dedicated and a high level class person. Always extremely positive and super efficient. Looking forward to be back at the Movenpick Casablanca Hotel.

Very good ambience and excellent service by head waiter Hasan. He greets all guests very well and makes extra effort to make sure customer is happy. I have never across such good service in any Casablanca hotel

Was an amazing experience for me and my family we had so much fun and we wish we can experience it again And I also wanna thank the receptionist and the reseption team RANIA FATIMA ZAHRAE Akil ZAKARIA and MAJID

I was so delighted to have such an experience at movenpick hotel. I enjoyed my stay and I was welcomed with warmth and a lot of hospitality. I would like to thank the reception team, Rania Rajab, Fatimazahra Lasfar, Akli Zakaria and Mjid Rais. I would definitely go back. I recommend this to all people.

A great place to stay, thanks to the receptionists and all the staff who made it feel like I am in the comfort of my own family. Excellent services and atmosphere. Rania, Fatimazahra, Zakaria et Mjid, thank you for your kindness and precious efforts. Would definitely visit you again next time I am in Morocco.
I enjoyed my time at this hotel Movenpick with my partner it was fun relaxing and i got a very warming and nice welcome from receptionists Rania Fatimazahra lasfar. Akli. Zakaria ans mjid raiss, 😍😍🤩😻

The hotel is great, everything was in accordance with my expectation. The hotel was spotless, and there was a nice relaxed environment around. All the staff were friendly and would go out of their way to help you, special thanks to Rania, Fatimazahra lasfar, and Akl Zakaria and mjid raiss. Definitely will recommend to others and already have.

Beautiful hotel ,the rooms are classy .It’s a great location,i loved everything there the service ,the staff,the food are excelent and special thanks to the reception staff Rania,Fatimazahra ,Zakaria and Mjid.

It’s a wonderful hotel, the staff are very attentive. Special note about Imane at the Spa, she was very attentive and caring. She makes clients feel amazing, the service and the experience was unforgettable!

Thank you Salma for all your help. Very knowledgeable, helpful and efficient service. A pleasure to be served and helped by Salma We will come back again. Its a lovely restaurant with great people L'hotel est superbe, tres propre et cest super agreable de manger au bord de la piscine .

I arrived early morning the hospitality was soo good, the service in general is super good, I would like to thank LATIFA she was helpful, and very friendly I liked her smile😍😍. I'm sure I'm gonna visit your hotel again and again ❤❤

Hassan and his support staff are great. The roof top restaurant is nice. Good food and a wonderful DJ. Hassan makes the difference and his service is wonderful. Would recommend this restaurant any time.

I stayed at the Movenpick hotel and enjoyed my stay, especially the restaurant at floor 16. The manager, Hassan does an excellent t jo and creates a frie day environment. From the food,staff and general operations of the place. He's a great manager and I will definitely stay here again The music is to die for as they play some awesome music and creates a great vibe for everyone. I love this place

Essafa was the head waiter provided amazing service. We really enjoyed the atmosphere. The staff was very helpful and spoke English which made it easy. Food was good quality. Would highly recommend to visits.

column3: Wonderful Day-to-Day Staff lifting up average hotel
column4: My husband and I stayed at the Movenpick Casablanca for several weeks. Here is my opinion: Pro: - The large majority of staff is excellent, they made the hotel feel like home! 5* In the morning we were greeted with a big smile by the wonderful Murat, and after a couple of days when we got to know everyone, our espressi even were brought without having to say a word - thanks again, this was much appreciated. A special thanks also goes out to Salma & Hassan at the 16eme, who welcomed us every evening with a genuine warm smile. I would go so far to say Salma is a born hostess: she has a wonderful mix of enthusiasm and class and everyone she talks to is simply a bit happier afterwards. Thank you both for making us feel so welcome! Finally, Alaaeddin, who absolutely saved the day.…

Unfortunately, there is a big difference between Movenpick years ago and the Movenpick of today. my last visit was really bad. my room was dirty, the furniture was old, in the only a few channels worked, the lamps on both sides of the bad were broken, the water pressor in the bathroom was too high, and the second day there was no water in the toilette. We asked reception to change our room, but they were unwilling. The breakfast was poor. i tried to accept the situation and enjoy my time in the hotel. the last day we had dinner in the top floor there we found a lot of people who were not hotel guests and some women dressed in appropriately. i asked one of the waters if the people where hotel guests and he confirmed that they were not, which means that anybody can come and go in…

I had a really good experience from the day one till my departure, starting from the smiling and welcoming lady’s in reception both of them named fatim Zara, the room was fresh and clean well organised, nice view Thanks for everything

What an amazing service by salma indeed she is the light of the restaurant 16th floor always smiling ,and good communication skills, i highly recommended for any kind of promotion or whatever it iis this survey is for, she is a rear pearl, wish i can take her away 😀 wish i can keep writing about my experience with her but time is limited.

The place is very beautiful and everyone here is good manners and treatment, especially Salma. I loved how she treated me and the way she spoke to clients. A place to visit. Don’t be shy to demand all what you want.

column3: I loved the staff so much all of them Idrissi and Imane zineb soumia hajer in the reception they were more than helpful and welc
column4: I loved the staff and their service they were so joyful helpful and welcoming no matter what was the department they were working in they would do their best For me it was a very satisfying experience and i would love to come back here again to have a nice vacation

It was bad experience 😔 for me the receptionist lady she doesn't know initing about reception procedure just she asked me about I'd after that I paid the room charges and I got my keys with out iny information for the facilities in the hotel . I hope for her to get training for the process for checking And check out . The room was very clean but no dental kit and but Rob no slipir no iron Ac and freezer it was not worked the security staff very helpful 👍 I wish to get my points rewards for this stay .

This place is amazing I can't to go back again and the stuff were nice to me , I want to thank latifa in restaurant she is amazing person Just an amazing hotel Much love for you guys Of course ill be back again

Amazing staff that is very customer-focus. I had an emergency health issue during my stay at Movenpick and M. Brouji and M. Idrissi have not spared any effort in supporting and driving me to the nearest clinic in town. A very supportive and very affable staff that made my stay very enjoyable. I have been spending every business trip at Movenpick over the past years and the longevity of the staff with little turnover is what guarantee the quality and consistency of service I have experienced. Thank you!

I’m very happy to be with you I would like to thank everyone specially the front office team and everyone in the restaurant , team Spa ,swimming pool very good . big thanks to every one I will return as soon as possible Thankyou again

column3: Don’t have high expectations. Not worth the money.
column4: Room was outdated. Elevator was scary. Bathroom was falling apart. No shower gel available and only 2 towels when we checked in for our anniversary. Room was too small and the phone was disconnected. This hotel does not deserve more than 2 star rating. The lounge was okay. No one acknowledged our celebration. Staff kept talked loud in front of the guests which I’m professional.

cranky elevators. electricity and a/c problems in most rooms. had to change 3 rooms until i found calm. not clear how they are on the same chain where other cities worldwide are so much better movenpick. this one is outdated and not well maintained. the rooftop is nice but is really separate from the hotel.

column3: Not a 5 stars hotel by any means
column4: A/c did not work and electricity went down few times. Had to change 3 rooms until a reasonable one that was not too small . Mediocre breakfast . Rooftop bar seems nice. But I will not recommend this outdated hotel. They need to renovate their crappy elevators as well.

They have managed an Event for me for 100 persons, the food was perfect and delicious, The Service was excellent, very professional staff, Highly qualified and trained staff, you can't ask for more , highly recommended

In my time at this hotel, I have to say that everything was wonderful and especially the house cleaning and attention that these two people from the cleaning service: Soumain and Zineb Abouelfath, thank you girls.

Essafa and their staff are so good people paying attentemption all moment giveng us the best selections during all time that we been here in the bar and in Casablanca. Good menu and good chillout after dinner in the rooftop with shishas and drinks.

column3: I would like to thank Hassan Head Waiter and his stuff for their hospitality, similing faces and service quality..
column4: I would like to thank Hassan Head Waiter of Roof Bar and his stuff for their hospitality, similing faces and service quality.. I really enjoyed to stay in this hotel, from now on I will stay in here when ever I come to Cassablanca. And also rooms are very clean.

Hotel location is great, rooms are clean and comfortable, roof bar is great also the staff is very friendly, solution oriented and helpful from the reception to the especially welcoming lady in the roof bar, Ms Imen, I would definetely visit again next time. Well done guys.

column3: Wedding anniversary. First trip to Morocco
column4: Essafa and his team at the Movenpick rooftop hotel are AMAZING! Salma and Hassan are so sweet and Essafa runs his team very well. The man who does the Hookah was also so kind and welcoming. It felt like home there and we will definitely be back! Thank you Movenpick team! I will recommend this place to all my family

column3: They need to do better with cleaning
column4: - 2 hours delay for check-in - not clean and has a bad smell - worst AC ever - room service didn’t add towels to my room and I need to call them for towels - location is in the city center and this is the only good thing about it

Tarik was available , kind and professional. Very nice people at the hotel. The rooftop is incredible : view,staff and music are top. I really enjoyed my vacations. Keep going you are on the right way.

We enjoyed our stay here. Room was excellent. The staff was great. The location is in Business area, and because we stayed Saturday night, everything around was closed. i only have a small grudge that the when I was paying my bill at check out, the front desk did not ask me if I wanted her to charge my credit card in MAD or USD. I ended up paying extra 5%, because of the conversion fee, which is not right.

The staff here are terrible always staring and in general racist! Dont bring your family here or dont come at all. Other people have shared the same experiences. They literally put racist signs up and look at you differently depending on where you are from truly disgusting.

I had really lovely time in Movenpick , staff were incredibly friendly and helpful, very clean and neat hotel I would like to thank Mr, Idrissi (the concierge) for his lovely assistance and kind care, he escorted me to the Atm machine in the corner and make sure that I was safe, this is really rare to find these days, so much appreciate it from my heart , le Mr chocolatier le plus gentil, merci bien pour les chocolats très délicieux, merci encore une fois

A great hotel !! extremely well located with a gorgeous roof top LA style looking over the entire city of Casablanca !! Very cozy and has beautiful pool in the middle. A amazingly delicious food and service also !! The staff is sooo friendly and professional and willing to do anything to make your stay enjoyable. Before I raise my hand someone is already on the way toward me for assistance. I would definitely recommend this place to anyone visiting Casablanca

I’ve been well served by Aicha, I’ve had an over all amazing experience. Excellent service and hostess, I would highly recommend this place. It has an amazing view and really many food and drinking options. Very nice hotel

Nicely located in the central business district of Casablanca, this hotel should probably have been brought down and rebuilt 30 years ago. The ground floor looks vaguely OK, but once you are on the rooms floors, it feels like you are back in 1980. Everything is depressingly grey, the walls are stained, the furniture is chipped... noise insulation is non existent and there is obviously a disco not far away with loud music till early morning. The staff does what they can and the breakfast is rather good, but it can not save an altogether depressing experience.

Pretty good location next to the tram. Or taxis to everything. Sortrice and Ziwed do a good job on the room. Breakfast was plentiful but not hot. Pool was refreshingly cold but the one ladder was broken and you needed to pole vault out. AC was not adjustable so the room stayed warm ( maybe I didn’t know how to work it). Receptionist were all polite. Overall barely a 4.

Arrived early at this hotel but dealt with by a very friendly, and professional receptionist called Fatima Alki . She was welcoming and sorted my room very quickly. The hotel had a nice feel about and my room was modern, clean and well equipped. I ate in the 16th floor restaurant and had an excellent meal and would happily eat their again. The hotel is ideally located near a tram stop ( to save westerners being taken advantage by less than honest taxi drivers) Overall a really good visit started by being dealt with by Faima who continued to provide great service throughout. A credit to Movenpick Hotel

It was a great experience here. The hotel staff were wonderful. The staff especially at the lounge on the rooftop were warm, friendly and attentive to our needs. It’s definitely one of the best choices for your stay in Casablanca.

The staff was very friendly. They did a good recommandation for all the activities we chose. And the activities turned out amazing. The hotel was clean. The room and bathroom were clean as well. I would highly recommend this hotel.

Exeptionally friendly and helpful staff in all regards. Quiet in the upper floors. Also the cozy pool bar on the roof top invites for small meetings. Good and central location especially for Business trips in the area.

Awesome place the view is splendid rooftop amazing service and food quality the room is very spacious the housekeeping lady Rachida is wonderful huge smile she made my day Breakfast needs improvement but not bad at all

Fine hotel in the center of casablanca, with big rooms. The food is great and the personel is very kind, especially Idrisse! The rooftop bar with pool is amazing, the view is great, perfect place for a drink. I highly recommed this hotel to everyone!

column3: Always good to be back here
column4: Thanks to everyone, they made me feel very comfortable, very clean rooms, always smiling and very friendly people, but from the welcoming desk, I specially thank to Mr. Idrissi, for his kindness and all the helps. Everything was perfect. Highly recommended.

This hotel is amazing. The staff particularly, took care of every single detail of my stay.Shout out to Idrissi Benayad Karim for his professionalism ! Ask for his services if you come, you'll be pleased !

column3: Movenpick Hotel and Spa: a Lovely Experience
column4: We had a lovely stay at the Movenpick Casablanca. There was a warm welcome from the staff on our arrival. The suite was spacious and well laid out. While the bed was too firm for my taste, the pillows and linens were quite comfortable. One of the highlights was my first hammam with Aicha at the hotel spa located on the 16th floor. As a first timer, I was a bit hesitant about booking the service, but didn’t want to miss out on such a uniquely Moroccan experience. Aicha made me feel very comfortable during the treatment, and I was amazed at how wonderful and soft my skin felt afterwards. Make sure to include a hammam at the spa if you visit the Movenpick Casablanca.

I've spent 3 days at this hotel for a vaccancy,and the service couldn't be better, kind and so efficient. From the reception to room service. The staff is very attentive and polite Excellent experience, I recommend it

Fantastic hotel, great location, really helpful staff and the roof terrace with pool and dining area is lovely with great views out over the city. The service from Hassan and the team on the roof terrace is 5star! Cheers from Chris & Dave

This is not my first stay and it definitely won’t be the last ! The staff is really friendly and professional especially Mr Tarik. The hotel location helps a lot too, since it’s located close to almost everything. (Less than 5 minutes from maarif if u want to go shopping, 10mins from the beach, and less than 10mins from the medina) Looking forward to my next stay.

Our visitors who came from abroad stayed in this hotel. They were satisfied : rooms are clean and they were always organised. Breakfast served on time and it was delicious. They had no remarks. they are always asking me to book in this hotel.

Great place to stay in Casablanca. The room staff even took care to fold the laundry. I recommend this place, close to the protectorat district, with many buildings of art-deco architecture. It’s also close to the beautiful jardin de la ligue Arabe. Very nice stay!

First of all it is good location Room is spacious and clean. Staff are very friend. I forgot her name but the lady cook at the egg cooking station greeted with smile everyday and was very courteous. The Hotel seems a bit old but it is well maintained.

We came with an orgenized tour at dinner time. There was not enough staff at rlthe dining room, not enough foood and no-one to talk to. It happened again in breakfast- not coffe, not even hot water..the dishes of vegetables, cheese was empty. Poor service..

Great place, great view, food and super kind staff!!!!!!! Best view of the city, a must for sure!!!!!!!!! Thanks for having us and making it an unforgettable night at Casablanca, would recommend to everyone looking for a place to have a nice time.

column3: Exceptional layover and exceptional concierge and receptionist
column4: The whole staff is just friendly smiley, check over guests all the time and sharing good vibes and energy. I would like to thank Mr Idrissi for the chocolate as well that was so kind of him. I wish could stay here for longer. But I would definitely come back here

I would like to thank Mr Hassan Zouhdy at the front concierge for his efforts and great help I lost my baggage and he persistently and patiently kept calling and doing all he can do to find my baggage and arranged everything so the baggage arrived quickly and safely to my hands I cannot thank him enough and he is one of main reason that I will come back to Movenpick Hotel Casablanca

Dear AICHA.. Thank you for being such an incredible beautiful woman, Your attention to detail at work makes you more unique. Keep up the good work. The service you provided exceeded all expectations.. Thank you for always going the extra mile with every little detail..

We loved Hassan head waiter for 16th floor! He served the best wine and was so friendly and had good service. He was so welcoming when we got in late after our flight from Madrid. Him and his staff were great, we recommend this hotel and the 16th floor bar/ restaurant.

column3: Very good service and warm personnel
column4: Warm reception by the starf… Special thanks to Idrissi, Jalila, Hichomi; Benyad and Jamil. Received complemetary chocolates and drink for the bar upon arrival. Goegeous rooftop terrace woth city view and nice spa. The massage was very good.

Currently staying in Movenpick Casablanca for about a week. Service here is patchy and mostly absent. Calls to Reception, Room Service and House-Keeping is often NOT answered. Requests made personally at the Reception have been forgotten, for example laundry pickup and ice. Gym equipment is not properly maintained and thick with dust. Noisy day AND night environment due to thin walls and incessant dog barking near the hotel. Can’t wait to check out!

column3: Very friendly and cosy with a lot of attention from the team
column4: Comfortable hotel with an excellent 16th floor rooftop pool and bar in Casablanca. Very friendly staff and the whole team is very attentive to make your stay a nice experience. Cosy feeling like you are at home. I clearly recommend the place and will come back. Kudos to the team making my stay so nice.

Good located hotel, big rooms, good breakfast. Check in was difficult, need to improve the services. Very nice roof-top restaurant with a pool, good services from the staff. Very good food, I recommend to visit this restaurant on the 16th floor of the building, with a beautiful sight on Casablanca.

Movenpick is one of my favourite hotels.i always travel extensively and particularly enjoy movenpick for the attention and kindness of the staff (specially to LATIFA), the attention to details and the comfort of the rooms. ❤❤

This hotel is my favorite in Casablanca, very clean and comfy. All the staff members are helpful and always smiling, a special thanks to Fatima Zahra from reception for her continuous support and kindness.

hello ;i stay three nights in this hotel it was perfect i want to thank the réception staff driss ;zakaria;fatima also the concierge staff borgi ;idrissi;zouhdy;jamil evrybody professionnel Thank you for being so hospitable and welcoming oh thanks to the breakfast staff i forget the nams sorry

I stayed at the Movenpik few times and love the Royal treatment. I will definitely go back. Thank you for being so hospitable and welcoming. The hotel is well situated and close to most key landmarks in Casablanca

Me and my family visited Casablanca and stayed at move n pick for a week. Its a great place with good food and nice ambiance. We had dinner at 16th floor and food was great. Hassan was very friendly, caring and hospitable. He paid great attention to all our needs. If you are in Casablanca, I highly recommend eating on the 16th floor cafe at move n pick.

column3: Movenpick hotel great location excellent service
column4: Excellent three night stay.staff was very helpful and friendly.excellent location for walking to various locations and areas of Casablanca reception always ready to help and zakaria was professional and accommodating at front desk. Would definitely stay here again

Great hotel of Swiss standard, full variety of breakfast, very good location, excellent Service. Arriving at the hotel gives a strong sense of relaxation. The restaurant staff are particularly warm-hearted. The roof top bar is very memorable.

Stayed for 6 nights here .. Movenpick was an exceptional host. Full marks for cleanliness , customer orientation and food . The hotel is situated at an ideal location with easy access to transport, supermarket and downtown attractions . Front desk staff were so welcoming and accommodated me with all my requests. Jalila and Khadija at reception and Abdelrahim and other culinary team (who would serve the best tea every day) were so hospitable . The place is highly recommended for travellers looking for a comfy stay in Casablanca

Always have a great experience at this hotel. All the staff are amazing from reception to concierge and especially the gentlemen in the bar upstairs. Hassan, mehdi and salah are to name but few. Service in this hotel is the best I have experienced across Morocco and I will for sure be back. Thank you all

We stayed in one of the Executive Rooms #701. The room is a good Size with a view of the City. The rooftop has a bar and a small swimming pool. It’s a small rooftop, but nicely decorated. There were 4 elevators in the hotel but they were a bit slow. The hotel is located near the city Centre and is mostly occupied by business travelers. Breakfast buffet is 180 MAD per person. Since the hotel is located on a busy intersection, you can hear traffic if you have a room on the lower floors. The Manager at the breakfast Restaurant/ rooftop bar is very friendly - great service!

We had a great experience during our stay in the hotel. All the staff took a good care of us. They are very kind, professional and always willing to help you. A special thank you to Hassan and his staff from the 16 ème Bar and Lounge, Mourad and his staff from the restaurant and the Hotel Manager Rahmani Medhi.

Very nice and friendly staff. The rooms are clean. The food is very good/tastefull. I love the restaurant with Hasan and his staff. Very friendly and they make the dinner experience pleasant. And the service is professional too.

Excelent staff at the Seizieme restaurant, super friendly people that are always focused in delivering the best service! The rooms are great and have an awesome view of the city, the food is really good with a good amount of options. Highly recomended.

I'm enjoying the time I'm spending at the hotel. We feel confortable at the hotel and the service is excelent. At "Le Sezieme" Restaurant Mr. Hassan and all the people of the restaurant are very nice and care about us. They always take good care of our orders and do a great job. It's a good place to stay when in business or in vacations.

Good quatlity, stuff on the 16th floor was really amazing and available! I loved the nuggets, the view, my friends and I didn’t wanna leave early but the lockdown. The atmosphere was really good and enjoyable

I would like to thank all roome service team especially Mr Idrissi who is very helpful and friendly person I recommand Movempick casablanca the olace to be and enjoy room service 24/24 Great team Great location Great stay Great moment

Very old furniture, not clean , you smell the smoke in a non-smoking room. The bathroom is not well maintained, no Shattaf. No Qibla orientation neither no prayer Matt . No reserved parking area , the location is very crowded ☹️ I will never repeat this visit to this hotel.

The hotel staff were very nice and professional. The restaurant at the 16th floor was awesome . I must specially mention Hassan and his colleagues on the 16th floor restaurant, they were simply amazing.. Great hotel in the heart of Casablanca!!

Hello, Im so satisfied about the amazing quality of service provided from all the personal, as well the welcoming and assistance from the professional receptionist during my stay, thank you Best regards

I went to visit one of my friends who works in Casablanca! He took me to this fancy terrace that is worth a review. The service is professional and fast, the view is nice and the material is overall all fancy. I liked it enough.

Hi guys I spent 7 nights in this amazing hotel. Very clean the rooms were absolutely massive I could have fitted 6 people on my bed😂😂. The rooms were cleaned daily before midday. The breakfast was delicious the staff at breakfast were absolutely great very kind and considerate. The staff at this hotel were just so so helpful during my stay words cant thank them enough. The rooftop bar pool was amazing even though there was a 9pm curfew I had such an amazing time at this hotel. I wouldn't swap this hotel in the future even if someone gave me free 7 nights stay. I had to get a covid test done prior to travelling back to the uk and the staff helped me do much with this. I'd like to thank all the staff here especially Mustafa who was very pleasant and caring. Thank you…

I spent one week at the Movempick for and the team was very pleasant. Especially the warm welcome of Mjide at the reception desk and the kind assistance, good mood and precious advices of Hassan from the restaurant le 16ème. The room are clean and comfortable. Was definitely a pleasant stay.

Great Hotel with perfect location and wonderful service . Special y Mr Idris from night reception Mr Reda from day reception they made my stay as comfortable as they could. Hajar and Rashida and fouuzia from house keeping were brilliant with a lovely smile and made my room with great care and provided all my needs. This was my 4th visit and I will be back soon.

I stayed 6 nights in Hotel moveinpick in Casablanca. This was my 4 visit, and as usual a great experience. Freinds staff specially Mr Idris from night reception desk and Mr Reda from day shift they both helped me with all my queries and gave a great service. And I can't thank enough to house keeping staff Miss Hajar and Miss Rashida and also Miss Fauzia who made sure my room was nice and clean and tidy during my stay and provide excels service with a wonderful smile. Thank you all the staff who made my stay pleasant. Also thank you to the concierge desk. 16th floor bar and restaurant with sushi bar and swiming pool was just wonderful. The hotel is very central located. So it was easy to reach by tram and taxi. All and all it was a memorable stay I will keep coming back. …

I've stayed more than a month in this hotel. I will start with the good things: is well located, rooms are most of the time clean, the breakfast is really good and the staff from restaurant are really nice both staff( from level 0 and rooftop), gym is nice as well and cleaned all the time.The negative fact is that sometimes internet is working really,really slow, housekeeping is not bringing to you the laundry every day even if you re giving the clothes before 9am and you need to call every time you need the clothes. I had Nadia as a cleaner in my room, and most of the time she s doing a great job.Overall, i had a nice stay. Special thanks to Tarik, who is trying to help you in every single problem you have and he is trying to make your stay comfortable at this hotel!he is a…

column3: I will definitely stay here again
column4: We are very pleased to stay here i give it 10/10 for location, service and friendliness and there was lovely Hostess Iman who is very pleasant and smily and looked after us well while we sat at the roof top pool . And the spa its must go for hamam recommend its great treat to finish your day

Pretty hotel with a nice location and a nice view to the city an Atlantic Ocean( if the widows were clean from outside, would be perfect). I like very much the personal that is working here, from the reception.. restaurant and the cleaners, the ladies are so nice and always ensuring the rooms are perfect. Especially Nadya, she knows to make a perfect room and to anticipate customers needs!!! Best regards to her and all the hotel!!!! It’s a pleasure to spend time here!💖 Kind Regards, Maya

The ambience was so relaxing and we really enjoyed it. Superb customer service specially the way how Ms. Latifa handled us. She was very nice and accommodating. I highly recommend her if you plan to visit this hotel. ❤

column3: A gem in the Casablanca sky.
column4: I just love their restaurant/bar on the roof. There's also a swimming pool right there. The food, the service, the ambiance are all fantastic. I highly recommend it since I have been there several times and plan on keeping visiting that wonderful establishment.

Movenpick Hotel was an excellent value; staff was very accommodating. We've stayed in these hotels in Europe and recommend them. Large, modern, clean guest rooms and bathrooms. The AC didn't work, but after we complained the staff sent fruit and food to compensate, and upgraded us to adjacent suites with better window ventilation. Outstanding breakfast. Good location.

It was a really good experience, we went with no reservation and we had Reda in the reception, he helped us out and got us a room really quick, that was awesome after a long tiring day in big Casablanca.

Very good location, clean hotel and Excellent customer service, LATIFA was assisting me , she is very nice helpful and professional.she is very accommodating and she put extra miles and that's why I like her ❤

Definitely is the best Business Hotel in Casablanca, i had a very good experience with the front office team, when i arrived they offered to good pack staycation which includes breakfast, diner and spa... Even we were amazed by the empathy of the receptionist Ihssan...

I had a very long stay in this hotel for business reasons. I am very grateful to the availability and kindness of all the staff, in particular to Fouzia and Nora who have always made me find a very clean and tidy room! A very welcoming environment, equipped with every comfort such as a gym, a large swimming pool on the terrace with a magnificent view over the city. Reception staff very good to resolve every kind of problem!

column3: Good hotel, well located, nice staff.
column4: Good hotel well located, the rooms aver very very spacious, very clean, nice and comfortable. I always go to this hotel when I am in Casa (several times a year). The staff is very nice. Breakfast is good.

It was outstanding, and Ihssan in reception helped us too much , she guided us to do couple things with my husband , i had a superb relaxing massage too and excellent dinner in the rooftop . Thank you all 🙏

Would like to bring a big thank you to all workers in Movenpick Casablanca it was a wonderful stay with amazing staff all clean and professional, keep going , we are proud of you will meet soon again for sure , all the best

OMG what a good Place to be the staff is really helpfull and nice and the rooftop is amazing and the staff is so friendly special Mr Hassan and his crew ❤ them . At the front desk we have the beautifull Fatima 😍 . This place gave me what I needed.

This property is Amazing, Movenpick staff are truly amazing people, big smiles on their faces, friendly and helpful. My room was great everything you need and more. JALLILA the receptionist was professional with big smile on her face. Thank you for making such a lovely time in casablanca.

Exceptional experience at this property. Amazing staff, friendly and helpful. JALILA is amazing and professional she did everything and more to accommodate my needs, catering staff also did there shares to make me feeling home, I will differently be back and I recommend this property as best place I stayed so far.

This was my second experience here at Mövenpick Casablanca,and definitely not my last one👍🏾 A very warm welcome from the The Valley parking guys to the room Service people, everyone been so helpful and nice. Location is very central and in my case close to all. The food was good and clean,same as the rooms are very clean and as I say a excellent service.

Incredible service and follow through. Kudos to the manager for going out of his way to help locate an office building. Clean lobby, nice atmosphere. Terrace is ideal for having a drink and reading. Staff always anticipating if I need another drink, a few pleasant surprises in my room. a rare jem in the heart of the city.

Perfectly situated hotel in a busy city. A nice place to relax after a working day. Cozy lounge bar at the roof top with beautiful view over the city. Good serving from the very kind staff. Nice drinks and food. Looking forward to visit the hotel again.

We have had a great evening with friends at the rooftop of Movenpick" le 16 eme " located in the center of Casablanca , I would highly recommend Nice Place to chill,The staff are great , Good service 👏👍

First time visiting this lovely place ,and not my last I'll comeback for suuure, Affordable menu, Great service, delicious food, good music, relaxing vue andvibes... Honestly Would one hundred percent recommend this ❤❤❤❤❤

column3: Best place to be in Casablanca
column4: What a charming and amazing retaurant 16eme at Movempick casablanca. I really appreciate the warm welcome from the General Manager Mr Amr killini and all his profesional stuff. The food, drinks and great view over all casablanca. It s the best sky bar and restaurant in down city. I recommend fully this paradise roof to all people who really who like to enjoy Casablanca

column3: The best service in the city
column4: Hassan and his team are doing a fantastic work in le 16eme. I have rarely seen such a dedicated team, they are always present, caring and full of attention. I would like to thank them for the great work they do, the experience would not be the same without them. Big thank you from Youssef

column3: one of the best servers in casablanca
column4: this hotel is hands down one of the best hotels in casablanca, the place is sooooo clean and professional. in the center of casablanca so it's the best for either business trip or a lovely vacation the rooftop restaurant is to die for , nice food and drinks a cozy pool and especially a looooovely staff 🤍 i can't be more satisfied with my experience thank you soooo much for the great séjour and a special thanks to Mr Hassan in " le seizieme " restaurant for everything ❤️

I'm having a great stay in this hotel, it's very clean and they are taking all the measures for covid prevention, very helpful and kind staff, a big thanks for Mr.Hassan and Mr.Said for making this experience even more enjoyable :)

The staff were amazing. Especially there is one man who works in the evenings Mr Hassan is awesome, very friendly, professionel and fast as ferrari. He made our evenings great with his service and smiling face. When you come here please find him.

I receive many supplier customers in Casablanca but during pandemic things where a little bit less easy. I had an amazing experience with the movenpick. The director Mr Tarik was very responsive, supportive and he made everything to make my guest comfortable. The hotel is very picky on the COVID 19 safety measures, sanitizing everywhere, distanciation, mask... thank you again movenpick for everything

i just wanna say that i was amazed by this place , the staff aree suppeer nice and lets not forget the rooftop bar who has an amazing pool with a city view , so calming and refreshing . i highly recommend this hotel ps : you have access to the roof bar even if you dont have a room its an open space for everyone .

The staff is very welcoming and respectful. The food is really good and the prices aren’t that high. Beautiful view, can see the whole city from the restaurant. The bedrooms are clean and pretty. Can’t say anything bad about it!

Hey guys. Mostly ı perefer the movenpick hotel all over the world but ı can say easly to this hoel is fantastic than the others. Stuff and menangements are really helpfull. The Room service operate all night in full condition. I don want to say something about roof bar. Its amazing. Thank you bro HASSAN. Here is much better with you 👍👍👍

Hotel is very nice, location, view and food quality is amazing and helpful staff and thanks to Mr. Tarek Director of Sales for his warm welcoming and hospitality , rooms is very comfortable and we had a really wonderful time.

Had a brilliant stay in Morocco, very nice hotel with friendly staff, I want to thank Mr.Tarek Director of Sales his help and support during our stay. I would definitely recommend the hotel & visit it again.

Perfect place for business travelers.. food was good and the staff was helpful and cheerful, also Mr. Tarek (one of the directors) was supportive and Proffesional .. my stay was really wonderful......

I visited the hotel last week, it was great. Thé food is amazing, good service, reasonable price and a nice view. I totally recommend this hotel and I would like to thank Mr. Tarik for his good welcoming.

column3: Excellent Hotel, handling the pandemic well!
column4: Despite arriving very early in the morning, they had the room ready for me in about half an hour. The rooftop restaurant is gorgeous, and the food is delicious. The staff were exceedingly friendly and courteous. The measures taken by the Movenpick Casablanca due to the pandemic made me feel very safe. Overall, I had an excellent experience and I would highly recommend this hotel!

I am upset that I even have to give this place a 1 out of 5, it should be -5. Compared to any other Movenpick I have ever been in this was by far a horror show from beginning to end. The staff was rude at best, very stand offish and argumentative, even aggressif at times. I was their on a business trip with 11 other people and everyone had the same experience, hellish !! The rooms had mold, they smelled are were very dirty, when you asked to be moved you got worse. Be ready to party because every night you can here the dj music until 3am, dont' bother moving, it is heard from every room. An employee sneezed in the buffet food in the morning and did even wash his hands after wipping his mouth and nose...there is a fishy smell on every floor as soon as you get off the…

column3: Huge thanks to Aïcha Fikri and Rahmani Mehdi
column4: very welcoming and excellent management, specially from the food and beverage team lead by Rahmani Mehdi, and I’m very grateful for Aïcha Fikri, for her luxurious welcome, she’s very nice, polite and loving, she took very good care of us and assured the quality of service, she also made sure that our food was being handled with care and she always has a smile on her face which makes everything better, and also the sanitary conditions are perfect Aïcha and her team provide us with everything that we need.

the service standard is very high, they always look for personalized service for each client magnificent, and the dishes are excellente. If someone asks me for a recommendation i will definitly say monvenpick.

column3: How on earth Movenpick can hire this kind of people????
column4: I am a CEO and a business traveler who is staying 90% of the days in hotels around the world and I never got this experience. I checked in at 11 am on the 6th of Jun 2020. they upgraded me to a suite which wasn't ready and checked before my arrival. So i asked some stuff that were missed and undone. At 11:30 i called the reception because of the air conditioning which wasn't working. They told me that the technicians are repairing it and it will work very soon. At 13:00 i met Majid at the reception who it "seems" don't know about air conditioning problem. At 15:00 I went back to the reception to talk directly with the front office manager assistant Mr. Mourad Saber, I was frustrated and i explained my case because it was like a torture for me staying in a room with more that…

a relaxing stay in movenpick Casablanca, all thanks to M.saber for his welcome and his professionalism. We loved also the restaurant view that was just amazing. Alone, with your partner or family, the movenpick Casablanca is the best place to book 👌

nice hotel good service good breakfast but breakfast is every day the same,very convenient to city tram ,very busy central location,restaurant on 16 floor nice sett up around swimming pool ,food is ok but not cheap for Morocco

Staff is very nice & welcoming. The patio on 16th floor offers a stunning view of the city. Special thanks to Hassan who always offers a heart warming welcome and makes sure you’ll have a pleasant and unforgettable stay.

Nice hotel, well located. good breakfast buffet. great view from the roof top bar. Manager Rahmani, Ms Aicha and all the staff were very friendly and welcoming. Highly recommended for your next trip to Casablanca.

hello some observations on my last stay at the movenpick casablanca room service - Mr Idrissi - perfect service; food is delicious(cous-cous a l'agneau, salade marocaine(which is never the same and always great)); really brilliant! breakfast - Mr Said(not sure i am not butchering the name) - no problem with the man with the Chef hat;) the room - always perfectly cleaned; Mr Driss the night manager - the best manager I have ever seen(repeating myself every time); the concierges - excellent! the Lady answering 9 - always useful and fast! the people at the reception - always smiling! Thank You All! PS and the flowers in the Lobby - just Incredible!

for a good time the Rooftop Resto Bar is the place to be Hassan the head waiter all ways goes above and beyond .Thank you 🙏 the drinks are awesome the food is good i would highly recommend anyone here for supper and drinks, you will love the sunsets and the ambiance great music.

It’s a great hotel. The staff members are very welcoming and respectful. The food is delicious, and it’s a great place. The sunsets are so pretty, and you can see the view of the whole city from the rooftop. Amazing experience!

I stayed here for three nights for business. The hotel room was super dirty and smelled like mold. The bathroom had water damage and was growing mold on the ceiling. The cleaning service never replaced my water- in fact I was almost done with the first bottle I received and when they cleaned the next day, they just put the “complimentary sign” back on the used water bottle. They also did not replenish the vanity kit that was clearly used. They just put the empty box back in place as if they refilled it. The part that made me the most mad was when I can back to my hotel room on day three with the “do not disturb” sign. They took the sign down, cleaned part of my room and then left a clear display of opening and using my perfume that I had zipped up in a bag. Will never be…

Stayed here for 3 nights on a prepaid business trip, if it weren't a time consuming headache, I would've switched hotels. The entire place needs some urgent TLC, as others have stated- the smell of sewage is apparent on most of the floors. A lot of spot cleaning going on, with an obvious lack of deep cleaning. Careful of the elevators, some shake so bad or door creaks open so slowly it's completely possible someone will get trapped inside. Egg station workers not using gloves and one fork to mix all requests as well as transfer finished items to plates. No ATM on site, nor did they have enough cash to exchange money. All of the staff I encountered were extremely friendly, it's obvious that they have to apologize for the state of the hotel often. It's unfortunate because…

Absolutely enjoyed this property! We have been very pleased with everything! Thanks to Said, Hicham and Fouad for the extra effort! The buffet was excellent with an amazing variety, perfect service and a warm atmosphere!

Excellent service Said, Fouad, Hicham were very helpful. Would recommend thank you! Hotel is very nice the conference room was nice. They also have a nice pool and a good gym. Can’t recommend enough. Front desk was also helpful.

It's was a magical stay! the staff is so wow! The hotel is pretty, the view of the rooftop is beautiful, and i want to thank especially Sir Tarik Kerdoudi who was adorable with us! Will be back soon Tarik :)

Aicha Fikri was amazing host during my stay and the restaurant was serving the best food and active stuff too, I used to come late and they never mentioned to me that the restaurant about to close they were welcoming me every time.

I chose Movenpick Hotel and it was absolutely the best decision I made, by the name of me and my family, we would like to thank M. Aicha Fikri for her hospitality, her generosity, her spontaneous smile at all stages of the day, and the best service with its delicious dishes every single day. she really represented the hotel in the best possible way ... it was an experience to repeat.

Came for business trip. Amazing place and atmosphere, Ayoub at the swimming pool area was AMAZING def coming back for his service !!thank you for having us. Great evening with Mexican theme and music,

The hotel is very clean and comfortable, well located near the centre of Casablanca. I recommend it. The Staff is really courteous and helpful, like Aicha for example, welcoming you before having breakfast.

column3: Please educate your receptionist to speak properly to the guest
column4: I called to speak to my wife and the reception was soo didnt event want to listen to my request he kept saying she is not there he didnt even took time to check and at the end she is there. You dont feel any kind of attention. I definitly wouldnt recommend it i called 15/02/2020 morning time

column3: Love the staff, the food ..... and the pinâ colada’s
column4: During my stay ( that will sum-up by the way) I we’re alone but thanks to the staff I didn't feel alone. In fact, I felt very welcome and taking care off. Especially Hassan who I met at breakfast and is still working when I eat diner made my stay comfortable. I give them 5 stars each because they deserve every star ⭐️ See you next time.

column3: What a lonely place and friendly people!
column4: Together with a collegue we were in the Movenpick Casablanca for 5 nights. We had a drink after a latenight arrival. Hassan, Ayoub and the rest of the team did everything they could to make us comfortable. Several times we had diner and they never stopped smiling. They did everything they could to please us. They even made IT psoosible to have Maroccan food, what was NOT on the menu, without overcharging us. Hassan and his team are a good reason to come back to the Movenpich whenever I visit Casablanca. Thanks a lot People of the seizieme to make this trip memorable.

I traveled to Casablanca in December with a group of friends. The hotel is located right in the center of what looks like the business district. Easily accessible to many things. The rooms are comfortable, the hotel looks like it might need an upgrade very soon! The staff is very friendly. The rooftop restaurant and pool is beautiful!! While we were there they had a guest Chef from Egypt. The food was amazing!! I would recommend that even if you don't stay at this hotel you go upstairs to try their food. So yummy!!

loved the place especially for the great room and beautiful view! Aicha from the restaurant has been helpful to offer her guidance. Hoped the breakfast could be as good as other similar hotels in the area.

This is definitely not a five-star hotel. I would give it three stars at most. Dirty hallways are the first indication that this is not a five-star hotel. Bathroom sinks are just horrible, water splashes everywhere. Brown toilet paper looks and feels like sandpaper. Our room was close to some kind of disco or a party, and we were not able to sleep the whole night. I would not stay here again.

I have been many time to your hotel and I can say that your staff are just amazing with us , they are very friendly and professional, always welcome you with a smile and take care of you ! Special thank you to Aicha and also Idrissi Rahmani always A pleasure to see them. 16 floors staff thank you for been their for us.

It is a good hotel we enjoyed our stay, especially with their restaurant service. Special thanks to Aicha Fikri for being friendly and professional. We would definitely comeback next time for more!!!!

as second time here it was very good experince with this hotel and everything was fine, the staff was helpful and room was perfect, breakfast buffet was great with many selections. i would like to thank Mrs. Aicha Fikri for special assistant.

We had a great weekend, we want to thank all the staff especially Mme Aicha at the reception, always smiling, welcoming and professional. The food was good especially the breakfast :P . We will come back definitely next time.

A club had just opened in the basement of the hotel and since then it’s even worse There is no isolation system and it’s not sound proof I do not sleep my bed keeps moving in with the bass sound system even if I put earplugs it is terrible and unbearable Besides that there is a big problem in the sinks in the bath tubs it keeps flooding with nasty water how many times I couldn’t take a shower before I go to work.

I had the opportunity to attend a professional training withing the Hotel business center. The equipment was provided as requested in a timely manner. The staff are welcoming and friendly. Food was OK.

The service is great and the staff offer a really hospitable environment. As a company that organizes training regularly in the hotel, we have our demands met in a fashionable and timely manner which is why we always like to go back.

We were 4 people, we stayed here for 3 days, I would like to tell you how the staff are nice and friendly especially "Aicha" thank you for all of your help and advice, I'm sure I will come back here again, you made me loyal now.tooooooooooooooooooopppppppppppppppppppppp

column3: The best staff = the best services
column4: My week spent in the hotel (25/11 to 29/11) was simply great. Starting with a warm welcome from the concierge Mr Mostafa who referred us to the best places in the city. The rooms were well equiped and cleaned each day by the housekeeping team (Amina & Kenza), The breakfast staff was the best! Mme Nadia and Aicha welcome guests each morning and make sure they have the best services, along with the waiter Hassan, Hayat & Fadoua who were in charge of the cooking. I was really satisfied with my experience and I highly recommend this hotel.

The Concierge Zouhdy merits a special mention. He was most helpful and accommodating to these first visitors to Casablanca. He couldn't help us enough which was very rewarding. This hotel was good. The rooms were pleasant and all the amenities were available. What let the hotel down was the restaurant on the 16th floor - well the night we were there. It was cold being open to the sky. It was noisy, the stereo was turned up too high. The food was disappointing ( no choice of soup, either chicken or fish, and no choice of desert, just a plate full of chopped up apples) The fish was soggy. I would recommend going to the other restaurants in the Hotel (not open when we were there). Very good choice for Breakfast.

I spent 3 nights here early January. The Manager was softly spoken and highly, highly obliging when the Receptionist had me waiting 45 minutes because she couldn't process the deposit on my debit card. I was upgraded to the 14th floor which meant I was given a nicer room than my 280 euros had given me but beware of noise from above - music and chairs scraping from the conference facilities on the 15th floor. Now to the best bit. The Chambermaid that serviced my room on my 2nd day, I am told, was called Sumaya. This lady was sent by God as an Angel to set the standards for the lucky few that can see the difference. The little touches like the splay on the bathmat and scattering of my toiletries showed this Lady has real flair and creativity. She even tweaked the shape of the…

column3: Should not have the Movenpick Name
column4: If this was a normal two star hotel, I would say that everything was fine, but this is a Movenpick Hotel chain that does better than fine, and we expected that. We would say our stay was more akin to a Best Western or Holiday Inn rather than a Movenpick. However, we booked Movenpick because we are always impressed by the attention to detail by the staff, excellent service, and delicious breakfast buffet. The staff were not very helpful. It was my birthday, and I wanted a pedicure. Unfortunately, nowhere in the room was there a number to call the salon. So I walked upstairs, and waited over 20 minutes, and no receptionists or staff of the spa appeared. I spoke to someone in the bar, explaining I just wanted to book an appointment. He spoke to someone who was giving another…

Recently visited here with my family and the hotel was in excellent shape. People who worked there were mostly locals who are knowledgeable and friendly. Perhaps the highlight of my trip were two ladies (Aisha and Nadia) at breakfast who kept giving me recommendations for the most authentic Moroccan breakfast food! I was very appreciative of their help. I posted my breakfast pics to social media (see attached images) and my moroccan friends agreed. Overall, I would highly recommend this hotel.

Nice room ; spacious clean bathroom , convenient location , good restaurants nearby , safe area and close to tram. Staff courteous and helpful. Breakfast is overpriced so dont take that option if you can avoid . Walk to nearby restaurants with good breakfast especially NKOA is the best place to have food very close to the hotel.

We had a good experience with one of the team, her name is Aicha. Nice welcome with friendly words, always helpful with a smile and asking us if we want something she is taking care for us every morning so i think the next holiday we will chose this Movenpic hotel here in Casablanca so thanks for Aicha you make us happy every morning

The service very good, the restaurant, the rooms clean, big and confortable, Aicha, she was very helpful all the time and caring about customers, she always smile I get at the hotel,at least once a month and always is a pleasure

column3: Always a huge pleasure to be there
column4: It is always a pleasure to return. We feel like at home. We are very well received, the staff are very charming, professional, available and attentive. I take this opportunity to salute all the staff who oversee all of this and especially Ms. Aicha who welcomes us with her big smile, her kindness and above all her efficiency, every morning at breakfast, a huge breath of oxygen to start the day nicely. We are in quiet in this hotel, not to mention its location, security, cleanliness and of course the restaurants and the quality of the breakfast.

Great room, extremely friendly staff all around! F&B outlets extremely disappointing! Most of the time the main dining restaurant was closed fro private parties and we could not have a decent meal after a long day of meetings and have to venture in search of food in the neighborhood. Secondary outlet on the roof was no offering anything decent and was also having private functions most of the time. My opinion - only use the hotel for bed and breakfast and plan your lunch and dinner somewhere else.

Thank you to all the staff for the great welcoming especially Aisha, who is a very smily person. Very clean and confortable bedroom as well. The location is good with some souk nearby to go local shopping.

We had breakfast at the hotel every morning that we stayed there. Aicha was the hostess with a smile, very accomodating and pleasant. The staff was pleasant and accomodating too. The breakfast, a good spread.

I feel like their rooftop restaurant called le 16eme is such an amazing addition to an already good hotel. We visited the restaurant almost every night to grab a bite after a long day of work and the service was always amazing. The whole staff is incredibly friendly and welcoming. Special mention to Mr. Azekri, he would always make sure we were taken care of at the best of his ability and beyond. I highly recommend visiting the restaurant even if you are not staying at the hotel. It has quite the view as well which is always a plus in my book. Again, thank you to Mr. Azekri for such a warm welcome.

Movenpick Casablanca is a very good hotel with a very attentive and professional staff. All are very friendly and helpful. Hassan, at the 16th floor terrace, and Marwan at front desk were very kind and courteous. Food was delicious.

Food was great speacially the staff (HASSAN) attending all our needs, very accommodating and polite. Thumbs up also to his fellow colleagues AYOUB and ABDELHALIK in the bar. They were all very nice to us. We really appreciate their help. We also worked previously in one of the 5 star hotels in Dubai and i can really say that attitude matters. THANK YOU GUYS AND CONTINUE YOUR EXCELLENT SERVICE. CHEERS!! 👏👏👏

We had food and drink at their bar on the 16th floor and our server Hassan and his colleagues were extremely friendly and professional and made us feel welcomed. Thank you guys for your hardwork and patience..

As I come here often for business I always have an amazing experience. Hassan,one among the great crew here, offer an outstanding service. He is so professional,kind,attentive to our needs and details oriented. I highly recommend anyone to enjoy a drink ,meal or stay at this hotel. Home away from home. Thank you so much for making me feel special every time. Each time I am looking forward to come back. Nancy

This hotel was nicely updated, clean, with large rooms. Would stay again! We stayed in some other hotels in Morocco and this hotel had by far the most comfortable beds! Aicha was great! Best hotel in Casablanca by a mile.

column3: nice and roomy with nothing around it
